meanings.definition: Engraved or carved illustrations or designs
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed beautiful gravures of ancient artwork.
meanings.sent2: She collected rare gravures of famous paintings.
meanings.sent3: The artist accidentally spilled ink on the gravures, creating a unique effect.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a gallery filled with vivid gravures of memories.
meanings.sent5: The gravures in the book were so detailed, they seemed to come to life.

meanings.definition: Prints made from an engraved plate
meanings.sent1: The bookstore had a sale on historical gravures of famous landmarks.
meanings.sent2: He framed the gravures and hung them on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the stack of gravures, creating a mess.
meanings.sent4: The gravures on the wall whispered stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The gravures in the exhibition were so clear, it felt like you could touch them.

meanings.definition: To engrave or carve designs or illustrations
meanings.sent1: She carefully gravures her initials on the tree trunk.
meanings.sent2: The artist gravures intricate patterns on metal plates.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly gravures a smiley face on the pumpkin for Halloween.
meanings.sent4: Time gravures wrinkles on our faces as we grow older.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor gravures his emotions into the marble with each strike of the chisel.
